bug.author: jakepoz
bug.summary: Possible copy-paste bug in NN parser
bug.description:
spaCy/spacy/syntax/nn_parser.pyx
Lines 59 to 60 in a3c43a1
conv_depth = util.env_opt('conv_depth', cfg.get('conv_depth', 4))
conv_window = util.env_opt('conv_window', cfg.get('conv_depth', 1))
Is it possible there is a copy/paste mistake when reading the conv_window parameter, and it just reads the same value as conv_depth?

comments.comment: That is indeed a mistake! Thanks. Now I'm confused as to why this hasn't caused more problems? I guess it might be relatively recent.

Thanks for the report! I had recently found and <denchmark-link:https://github.com/explosion/spaCy/commit/cd0a9e58dcf5ec4316e6b1aaa954c55a9ea18cf4>fixed</denchmark-link> this on a side branch of spaCy that will be integrated in the near future, but I'll quickly add the fix also to for use in the meantime.
